00021 ConstMapping* MappingUtils::createCompatibleMapping(ConstMapping& src, ConstMapping& dst){
00022   typedef FilledUpMapping::KeySet KeySet;
00023   typedef FilledUpMapping::KeyMap KeyMap;
00024   KeyMap keys;
00025 
00026   const DimensionSet& srcDims = src.getDimensionSet();
00027   const DimensionSet& dstDims = dst.getDimensionSet();
00028 
00029   DimensionSet::const_reverse_iterator srcDimIt = srcDims.rbegin();
00030   for (DimensionSet::const_reverse_iterator dstDimIt = dstDims.rbegin();
00031      dstDimIt != dstDims.rend(); ++dstDimIt)
00032   {
00033     if(srcDimIt != srcDims.rend() && *srcDimIt == *dstDimIt){
00034       ++srcDimIt;
00035     } else {
00036       keys.insert(keys.end(),
00037             KeyMap::value_type(*dstDimIt,
00038                       KeySet()));
00039     }
00040   }
00041 
00042   if(keys.empty())
00043     return &src;
00044 
00045   ConstMappingIterator* dstIt = dst.createConstIterator();
00046 
00047   if(!dstIt->inRange()){
00048     delete dstIt;
00049     return &src;
00050   }
00051 
00052   do{
00053     for (KeyMap::iterator keyDimIt = keys.begin();
00054        keyDimIt != keys.end(); ++keyDimIt)
00055     {
00056       keyDimIt->second.insert(dstIt->getPosition().getArgValue(keyDimIt->first));
00057     }
00058 
00059     if(!dstIt->hasNext())
00060       break;
00061 
00062     dstIt->next();
00063   }while(true);
00064 
00065   delete dstIt;
00066 
00067   ConstMapping* res = setMappingBuffer(new FilledUpMapping(&src, dstDims, &keys));
00068   return res;
00069 }
00070 
00071 bool MappingUtils::iterateToNext(ConstMappingIterator* it1, ConstMappingIterator* it2){
00072   bool it1HasNext = it1->hasNext();
00073   bool it2HasNext = it2->hasNext();
00074 
00075   if(it1HasNext || it2HasNext){
00076     if(it1HasNext && (!it2HasNext || it1->getNextPosition() < it2->getNextPosition())){
00077       it1->next();
00078       it2->iterateTo(it1->getPosition());
00079 
00080     } else {
00081       it2->next();
00082       it1->iterateTo(it2->getPosition());
00083     }
00084 
00085     return true;
00086   } else {
00087     return false;
00088   }
00089 }

00091 Mapping* MappingUtils::createMapping(const DimensionSet& domain,
00092                   Mapping::InterpolationMethod intpl) {
00093   assert(domain.hasDimension(Dimension::time));
00094 
00095   if(domain.size() == 1){
00096     switch(intpl){
00097     case Mapping::LINEAR:
00098       return new TimeMapping<Linear>(intpl);
00099       break;
00100     case Mapping::NEAREST:
00101       return new TimeMapping<Nearest>(intpl);
00102       break;
00103     case Mapping::STEPS:
00104       return new TimeMapping<NextSmaller>(intpl);
00105       break;
00106     }
00107     return 0;
00108   } else {
00109     switch(intpl){
00110     case Mapping::LINEAR:
00111       return new MultiDimMapping<Linear>(domain, intpl);
00112       break;
00113     case Mapping::NEAREST:
00114       return new MultiDimMapping<Nearest>(domain, intpl);
00115       break;
00116     case Mapping::STEPS:
00117       return new MultiDimMapping<NextSmaller>(domain, intpl);
00118       break;
00119     }
00120     return 0;
00121   }
00122 }

00124 Mapping* MappingUtils::createMapping(double outOfRangeVal,
00125                 const DimensionSet& domain,
00126                 Mapping::InterpolationMethod intpl) {
00127   assert(domain.hasDimension(Dimension::time));
00128 
00129   if(domain.size() == 1){
00130     switch(intpl){
00131     case Mapping::LINEAR:
00132       return new TimeMapping<Linear>(outOfRangeVal, intpl);
00133       break;
00134     case Mapping::NEAREST:
00135       return new TimeMapping<Nearest>(outOfRangeVal, intpl);
00136       break;
00137     case Mapping::STEPS:
00138       return new TimeMapping<NextSmaller>(outOfRangeVal, intpl);
00139       break;
00140     }
00141     return 0;
00142   } else {
00143     switch(intpl){
00144     case Mapping::LINEAR:
00145       return new MultiDimMapping<Linear>(domain, outOfRangeVal, intpl);
00146       break;
00147     case Mapping::NEAREST:
00148       return new MultiDimMapping<Nearest>(domain, outOfRangeVal, intpl);
00149       break;
00150     case Mapping::STEPS:
00151       return new MultiDimMapping<NextSmaller>(domain, outOfRangeVal, intpl);
00152       break;
00153     }
00154     return 0;
00155   }
00156 }

00219 double MappingUtils::findMax(ConstMapping& m) {
00220   ConstMappingIterator* it = m.createConstIterator();
00221 
00222   double res = -DBL_MAX;
00223 
00224   while(it->inRange()){
00225     double val = it->getValue();
00226     if(val > res)
00227       res = val;
00228 
00229     if(!it->hasNext())
00230       break;
00231 
00232     it->next();
00233   }
00234   delete it;
00235   return res;
00236 }
00237 
00238 double MappingUtils::findMax(ConstMapping& m, const Argument& min, const Argument& max){
00239   //the passed interval should define a value for every dimension
00240   //of the mapping.
00241   assert(min.getDimensions().isSubSet(m.getDimensionSet()));
00242   assert(max.getDimensions().isSubSet(m.getDimensionSet()));
00243 
00244   ConstMappingIterator* it = m.createConstIterator(min);
00245 
00246   double res = it->getValue();
00247 
00248   while(it->hasNext() && it->getNextPosition().compare(max, m.getDimensionSet()) < 0){
00249     it->next();
00250 
00251     const Argument& next = it->getPosition();
00252     bool inRange = next.getTime() >= min.getTime() && next.getTime() <= max.getTime();
00253     if(inRange) {
00254       for(Argument::const_iterator itA = next.begin(); itA != next.end(); ++itA) {
00255         if(itA->second < min.getArgValue(itA->first) || itA->second > max.getArgValue(itA->first)) {
00256           inRange = false;
00257           break;
00258         }
00259       }
00260     }
00261 
00262     if(inRange) {
00263       double val = it->getValue();
00264       if(val > res)
00265         res = val;
00266     }
00267   }
00268   it->iterateTo(max);
00269   double val = it->getValue();
00270   if(val > res)
00271     res = val;
00272 
00273   delete it;
00274   return res;
00275 }
00276 
00277 double MappingUtils::findMin(ConstMapping& m) {
00278   ConstMappingIterator* it = m.createConstIterator();
00279 
00280   double res = DBL_MAX;
00281 
00282   while(it->inRange()){
00283     double val = it->getValue();
00284     if(val < res)
00285       res = val;
00286 
00287     if(!it->hasNext())
00288       break;
00289 
00290     it->next();
00291   }
00292   delete it;
00293   return res;
00294 }

00296 double MappingUtils::findMin(ConstMapping& m, const Argument& min, const Argument& max){
00297 
00298   //the passed interval should define a value for every dimension
00299   //of the mapping.
00300   assert(min.getDimensions().isSubSet(m.getDimensionSet()));
00301   assert(max.getDimensions().isSubSet(m.getDimensionSet()));
00302 
00303   ConstMappingIterator* it = m.createConstIterator(min);
00304 
00305   double res = it->getValue();
00306 
00307   while(it->hasNext() && it->getNextPosition().compare(max, m.getDimensionSet()) < 0){
00308     it->next();
00309 
00310     const Argument& next = it->getPosition();
00311     bool inRange = next.getTime() >= min.getTime() && next.getTime() <= max.getTime();
00312     if(inRange) {
00313       for(Argument::const_iterator itA = next.begin(); itA != next.end(); ++itA) {
00314         if(itA->second < min.getArgValue(itA->first) || itA->second > max.getArgValue(itA->first)) {
00315           inRange = false;
00316           break;
00317         }
00318       }
00319     }
00320 
00321     if(inRange) {
00322       double val = it->getValue();
00323       if(val < res)
00324         res = val;
00325     }
00326   }
00327   it->iterateTo(max);
00328   double val = it->getValue();
00329   if(val < res)
00330     res = val;
00331   delete it;
00332   return res;
00333 }

00359 LinearIntplMappingIterator::LinearIntplMappingIterator(ConstMappingIterator* leftIt, ConstMappingIterator* rightIt, double f):
00360   leftIt(leftIt), rightIt(rightIt), factor(f) {
00361 
00362   assert(leftIt->getPosition() == rightIt->getPosition());
00363 }
00364 
00365 LinearIntplMappingIterator::~LinearIntplMappingIterator() {
00366   if(leftIt)
00367     delete leftIt;
00368   if(rightIt)
00369     delete rightIt;
00370 }
